Uses of Package
thelastpromise

Classes in thelastpromise used by thelastpromise
AttackEffect
           
AttackUnit
          This class extends the Unit class and is used to send the drawing information for the AttackUnit to its parent Unit class so it can be drawn, and to highlight the tiles that the AttackUnit can move to if it is selected.
Building
          The class extends the Object, draws the graphics, and opens the openBuildMenu
BuildMenuFrame
           
Location
          This class has the location passed down and creates the coordinates
MainMenuScreen
           
Object
          This Object class passes an image and sets the coordinates for it.
Player
          This class presents the player to the game along with their name, and the different units that the player has obtained, such as the gold, turn movements, and listens to the time of actions.
SupportUnit
          This class draws the SupportUnit at the specifed location
Tile
          This abstract class extends the Object.
Unit
          This Unit class extends the Object and presents the different components of the game, such as health, actionpoints, maxactionpoints etc.
